name: Vegan Chickpea Salad
description: This vegan chickpea salad with kidney beans, tomatoes, and cucumber is one of my favorite salads! It's the perfect addition to BBQs and potlucks, it's super healthy, and very easy to make!

recipeInstructions.text: Rinse the canned chickpeas and kidney beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Rinse the canned chickpeas and kidney beans.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the Spanish onion. Dice the cucumber and the tomatoes.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the Spanish onion. Dice the cucumber and the tomatoes.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely chop the parsley. Combine everything in a large bowl and stir in the lemon juice and the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Finely chop the parsley. Combine everything in a large bowl and stir in the lemon juice and the olive oil. Season with salt and pepper.
